entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is the person to whom Harry is speaking and trying to convince of the presence of dragons.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who has seen the dragons and is trying to inform Cedric about them.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts who might be looking for Cedric.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has knowledge about the dragons.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person who will know about the dragons along with Krum.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who will know about the dragons along with Fleur.

entities.name: maxime
entities.description: Maxime is a person who saw the dragons and will inform Karkaroff.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a person who saw the dragons and will be informed by Maxime.

entities.name: dragons
entities.description: Dragons are the creatures that Harry has seen and Cedric needs to get past.

relationships.description: Harry is informing Cedric about the presence of dragons.
Hagrid has knowledge about the dragons, which Harry knows.
Maxime will inform Karkaroff about the presence of dragons.
Fleur and Krum both know about the presence of dragons.
